plugins.name: AppleDoc
plugins.author: Kyle Fuller
plugins.description: Generates docset and documentation for a pod.

plugins.name: Deploy
plugins.author: James Campbell
plugins.description: Deploys dependencies for a CocoaPods project without needing to clone the repo (Similar to Bundler's `--deployment`).

plugins.name: Rome
plugins.author: Boris Bügling
plugins.description: Rome makes it easy to build a list of frameworks for consumption outside of Xcode, e.g. for a Swift script.

plugins.name: Deintegrate
plugins.author: Kyle Fuller
plugins.description: Deintegrates a project from CocoaPods.

plugins.name: Pod Dependencies
plugins.author: Samuel E. Giddins
plugins.description: Shows a project's CocoaPod dependency graph.

plugins.name: Pod browser
plugins.author: Toshihiro Morimoto
plugins.description: Open a pod's homepage in the browser.

plugins.name: Check Latest
plugins.author: Yuji Nakayama
plugins.description: Checks if the latest version of a pod is up to date.

plugins.name: Pod docs
plugins.author: CocoaPods Dev Team
plugins.description: Convenient access to the documentation of a Pod via cocoadocs.org.

plugins.name: docstats
plugins.author: Boris Bügling
plugins.description: Showing documentation metrics of Pods.

plugins.name: open
plugins.author: Les Hill
plugins.description: Open a pod’s workspace.

plugins.name: Pod info
plugins.author: CocoaPods Dev Team
plugins.description: Shows information on installed Pods.

plugins.name: repo-svn
plugins.author: Dusty Clarkda
plugins.description: Adds subversion support to manage spec-repositories.

plugins.name: repo-hg
plugins.author: Dusty Clarkda
plugins.description: Adds mercurial support to manage spec-repositories.

plugins.name: Pod try
plugins.author: CocoaPods Dev Team
plugins.description: Quickly try the demo project of a Pod.

plugins.name: Pod watch
plugins.author: Marin Usalj
plugins.description: Watch for Podfile changes and run pod install.

plugins.name: Pods Roulette
plugins.author: Heiko Behrens, Marcel Jackwerth
plugins.description: Builds an empty project with three random pods.

plugins.name: Sorted Search
plugins.author: Denys Telezhkin
plugins.description: Adds a sort subcommand for pod search to sort search results by amount of stars, forks, or github activity.

plugins.name: Release
plugins.author: Oliver Letterer
plugins.description: Tags and releases pods for you.

plugins.name: cocoapods clean
plugins.author: Luca Querella
plugins.description: Remove Podfile.lock, Pods/ and *.xcworkspace.

plugins.name: CocoaPods Keys
plugins.author: Orta Therox, Samuel E. Giddins
plugins.description: Store sensitive data in your Mac's keychain, that will be installed into your app's source code via the Pods library.

plugins.name: CocoaPods Packager
plugins.author: Kyle Fuller, Boris Bügling
plugins.description: Generate a framework or static library from a podspec.

plugins.name: CocoaPods Links
plugins.author: Mike Owens
plugins.description: A CocoaPods plugin to manage local development pods

plugins.name: CocoaPods Prune Localizations
plugins.author: Diego Torres
plugins.description: Upon running pod install, this plugin will remove unused localizations by your project

plugins.name: CocoaPods Readonly
plugins.author: Mason Glidden
plugins.description: Developers switching from submodules are used to modifying library source files from within Xcode. This locks those files as needed so Xcode warns you when attempting to edit them.

plugins.name: CocoaPods Thumbs
plugins.author: Pablo Bendersky
plugins.description: Use cocoapods-thumbs to check upvotes or downvotes of Podspecs from your peers based on past experiences.

plugins.name: CocoaPods Blacklist
plugins.author: David Grandinetti
plugins.description: Check if a project is using a banned version of a pod. Handy for security audits.

plugins.name: CocoaPods Superdeintegrate
plugins.author: Ash Furrow
plugins.description: Deletes the CocoaPods cache, your derived data folder, and makes sure that your Pods directory is gone.

plugins.name: CocoaPods Archive
plugins.author: fjbelchi, alexito4
plugins.description: cocoapods-archive plugin that archive your project

plugins.name: CocoaPods Check
plugins.author: Matt Di Iorio
plugins.description: Displays differences between locked and installed Pods

plugins.name: CocoaPods Acknowledgements
plugins.author: Fabio Pelosin, Orta Therox, Marcelo Fabri
plugins.description: CocoaPods plugin that generates an acknowledgements plist to make it easy to create tools to use in apps.

plugins.name: CocoaPods Generator
plugins.author: 从权
plugins.description: Add files to empty target from *.podspec, such as souce files, libraries, frameworks, resources and so on.

plugins.name: CocoaPods Debug
plugins.author: Samuel Giddins
plugins.description: A simple plugin to ease debugging CocoaPods.
